comment: good app, does the job like no other on android but, not compatible with samsung galaxy s6, will put 5 stars when compatible !

It is impossible to make it compatible with Samsung's Galaxy S6. This devices does not have NFC chip by NXP.
Please have a look at: https://github.com/ikarus23/MifareClassicTool/issues/1

title: Doesn't work on LG G4
comment: It isn't in the list of incompatible phones, not sure what's the problem with this, either Lollipop OS or the reader itself? If so does it means my phone will never be able to write on  mifare classic 1k? Otherwise it's a simple to use app.

The LG G4 has the same NFC chip as the Galaxy S5 (NXP 47883). The S5 can read Mifare Classic. Therefore the G4 should too. Please try other apps like NFC Taginfo or NXP's NFC TagInfo. If they fail too, it is an issue with the NFC stack in the Android ROM. (There are a lot of new mobiles having trouble with reading Mifare Classic tags....)

title: Crashes on Lollipop HTC One M8
comment: Great app but after HTC One M8 update to lollipop stopped working when trying to read or write tags :( as 24-May-2015 thanks for solving this :)

The Mifare Classic support for  Android 5+ on HTC One (m7/m8) is still broken.
MCT has now a workaround to fix this.

title: Great app
comment: Has a ton of functions. Really helpful.

title: Works superb
comment: Bugs are also quickly fixed, greatly appreciated.

title: Great !
comment: Would be great too if this app could include mfoc 😳
Yeah, mfoc would be great. But unfortunately it is not that simple... :(

title: Stopped working after update to lolipop.
comment: Used to work perfectly on kitkat with my S5 but after upgrading to lolipop all i get when reading a card is Key A visible and all the sectors are filled with a dash. its a shame as it was a realy useful app :(

Working on it...
https://github.com/ikarus23/MifareClassicTool/issues/53
https://github.com/ikarus23/MifareClassicTool/issues/52

title: Love it
comment: I know this is only for mifare tags, but it would be nice if it detected other tags which do not need a key to be read and dumped. The only problem with this app is that there are too many toast messages on the read section, and it gets annoying sometimes. It would be better if all toast messages are directed into a console window which appears instead of password file chooser after clicking the map tags button. All in all its a great app.

title: Best Apps I have ever seen for NFC
comment: Very attractive and nice Apps. It is also very helpful.

title: Stupid Samsung Note 4!!!
comment: Samsung Note 4 does not support writing of NXP MIFARE Classic 1K tags.

title: Good app, but sector 0 write not working
comment: Tried writing to a sector 0 writable card using a HTC one. Unfortunately this fails, maybe incompatible card. Could you recommend any cards you have succesfully tested?

You have an incompatible card. 
Please read http://www.proxmark.org/forum/viewtopic.php?pid=7367#p7367
and the following posts. Some pages later you will also run into a
discussion on which tags to buy.

title: S3 works
comment: Bu sure to enable nfc first on your device.

title: Nexus 5
comment: Nexus 5 no support for Mifare Classic card, can be this changed or there is no possibility ? Overall good app but not fully working...

No, it can not be changed (due to hardware)!
https://github.com/ikarus23/MifareClassicTool/issues/1
Also, this is why the app is not listed on Google Play if you access the store from a Nexus 5!
Next time, please make sure you got everything right before rating.

title: Worked brilliant on Nexus 7
comment: Worked no problem on my Nexus 7.

title: Simply awesome!
comment: Awesome tool with useful functions that work really well!

title: Thanks!
comment: Was waiting for it also! Thank you!

title: Does not work on S3
comment: Once you start the application it tells you it won't work cause the S3 is lacking mifare Clasic support. Would have been nice to know this before downloading and installing.

Most of the people use this app on a S3 and it works perfectly.
It is most likely you used the app with a non-Mifare Classic card.
Please make sure you are using this app only with Mifare Classic tags
(it says so in the description too).
Next time, please make sure you got everything right before rating.

title: Finally
comment: A long awaited good tool. Thanks!
